title: Webcomponent Knowledge Graph
description: A webcomponent for showing info from a Knowledge Graph
descriptionAbstract: A webcomponent for a Knowledge Graph

options.default: PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>%5Cn          PREFIX geo: <http://www.opengis.net/ont/geosparql#>%5Cn          SELECT ?h ?pos ?posLabel ?posColor ?posIcon%5Cn          WHERE {%5Cn          ?h a schema:LodgingBusiness ;%5Cn             geo:defaultGeometry/geo:asWKT ?pos ;%5Cn             schema:name ?posLabel ;%5Cn             schema:address ?a .%5Cn        FILTER (lang(?posLabel) = 'de')%5Cn        # Colors%5Cn        OPTIONAL {%5Cn        ?h a schema:Campground .%5Cn        BIND('chlorophyll,0.5' AS ?posColor) # Green%5Cn        }%5Cn        OPTIONAL {%5Cn        ?h a schema:BedAndBreakfast .%5Cn        BIND('viridis,0.1' AS ?posColor) # Purple%5Cn        }%5Cn        OPTIONAL {%5Cn        ?h a schema:Hotel .%5Cn        BIND('jet,0.3' AS ?posColor) # Light blue%5Cn        }%5Cn        OPTIONAL {%5Cn        ?h a schema:Hostel .%5Cn        BIND('jet,0.8' AS ?posColor) # Red%5Cn        }%5Cn        OPTIONAL {%5Cn        # default%5Cn        BIND('jet,0.8' AS ?posColor) # Red%5Cn        }%5Cn        }%5Cn        LIMIT 500
